column5: I thought some of you might enjoy this....  http://www.metacafe.com/watch/2077360/bewa...ouse_hilarious/  p.-
LOL My mrs,s really enjoys her gym membership I got her. Not sure if it,s the losing of the wieght,or the hunks that are there.LOL
There isn't a woman in the entire world that will ever make ole Jed visit any dog house.
So does this mean new snow tires for Christmas is a bad idea?
Yea, but you see, you gotta have the stones to know what to say when she tells you to go in like a good boy....just say no like a man.
Sorry, I have to go now and take that nice little Shark Cordless that I bought at CTC last night back before it's too late!
Well...if it makes you feel any better, mine might be getting a divorce!
That is absolutely Hilarious, even funnier than the three Amigos in Ottawa

Now that's just plain nasty. Never been in the dog house. But I could tell you all some real scary stuff about sleeping on the couch     Sniff....your thoughtfulness brought a tear to my eye Cliff. Don't you dare return it. Sue would be overjoyed.
I'm not sure what to do with the liposuction, botox, and hot wax gift certificates now... I guess I could use them on myself.   ... hey Snag!... wanna swap Brazilian pics?
Now that's funny right there. Very disturbing...but funny
New snow tires are a great idea. It shows how much you care for her and the kids safety. Now a new vaccume cleaner............................................probably not so good.

And if she ever tells you that she wants something parked in the driveway that'll do 0-200 in 2 seconds flat, don't, I repeat DON'T wrap her bathroom scale and leave it in the driveway for her to find. There is no probation, no appeal....you're a lifer, Dude.

Lifer????? I'd be dead on the spot. Heck, last time I ticked Sue off I didn't see her for 4 days.   By the fifth day the swelling in my eyes had started to go down and I could make out some shapes and figures!
As much as it is supposed to be "the thought that counts" . This will still put you in the doghouse Drifter. But there may be room for an appeal  .
Put a bright shiny piece of jewellery in the middle of the tires and you're good as gold  Joey
Ooooooooooooohhhhhhhhh, Shiny!
Great idea!, I was actually thinking new chrome rims would be pretty sweet as well.
I've sent the wife to the doghouse. Went to Bingo and didn't come home til the next morning. Made her squirm for 4 days.  Payback's a _____!
A guy ended up in the doghouse over this project.
I did not end up in the dog house Bernie.... but it sure hurt when she pulled that ladder out from under me!
